name: Pop Girl Salon
description:
Define your personal fashion style, unlock loyal friendships with various personalities, and experience fun adventures with your loving boyfriend.

Be the Social Girl and create your own story - the world is your oyster!

FEATURES:

+ GOSSIP, HANG OUT & PARTY to make new girlfriends!
+ CREATE YOUR DREAM BOYFRIEND - he’ll take you out and spoil you with souvenirs from your dates!
+ GO ON A PHOTOSHOOT with your Girlfriends, and vote for the best shots!
+ DRESS TO IMPRESS and always rock the perfect outfit! Choose from a variety of clothing designs and make-up & hair styles. Be a trendsetter and dress up your friends too!
+ CUSTOMIZE YOUR ROOM in your favorite style from Hipster to Girly!

It’s all about experiencing new friendships, shopping at trendy boutiques to find the latest fashions, and dating your perfect guy – so do it all, unlock more features and be a Social Girl!
